arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS: How Carlisle United fared against Salford City
arts.sum: Carlisle United won 1-0 at Salford City – here's how we rated the players at the Peninsula Stadium.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United now just a point adrift in relegation zone
arts.sum: Carlisle United are now just one point adrift in the League Two relegation zone as rivals slipped up in the 3pm kick-offs.

arts.ttl: Barclay heads Carlisle United to dramatic win at Salford
arts.sum: Salford City 0 Carlisle United 1: Substitute Ben Barclay's late header earned Carlisle a dramatic and much-needed win at Salford City.

arts.ttl: Ben Barclay bags late winner for Carlisle at Salford
arts.sum: The substitute had only been on the pitch a matter of minutes.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United confirm Kadeem Harris signing ahead of Salford clash
arts.sum: Carlisle United have announced the signing Kadeem Harris - and he can play against Salford City today.

arts.ttl: Salford boss has his say on Williamson and Carlisle United
arts.sum: Salford City manager Karl Robinson claims it is far too early to judge Mike Williamson’s work at Carlisle United.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United fans' trust seek replacement for long-serving secretary
arts.sum: Carlisle United's Supporters' Trust are seeking a new secretary to replace the long-serving Alastair Woodcock.

arts.ttl: More Carlisle United staff additions on the cards
arts.sum: Mike Williamson has said that more additions to the staff at Carlisle United are likely.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United boss on January plans and sporting director talks
arts.sum: Head coach Mike Williamson says changes at Carlisle United are inevitable in the January transfer window.

arts.ttl: Former Carlisle United coach Skelton lands new job
arts.sum: Former Carlisle United assistant manager Gavin Skelton is back in football - at Hartlepool United.
